text:
I can't believe AI now makes (good) TikToks.

Copy my prompt (+ check the result at 01:14):

Prompt: "Create an engaging video about 'Fashion Flashback: The Y2K Comeback — Why We’re Back in Popcorn Tops & Low Rise Jeans'” Using the revival of early 2000s fashion as an example (popcorn tops, etc.).Include reactions from older vs younger generations. Could show re-styled versions. Use only real-world assets."

Tool: Agent Opus from OpusClip, my partner.

How to master Opus Clip:

1. Start with a YouTube video.
2. Upload a link, get 20-40x TikTok videos.
3. Test their Agent Opus (it's in beta for now).
4. Use this Opus guide: https://lnkd.in/d4FZamEH.
